Level Eight
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Card & Adventure Video Games: Monster Rancher Explorer Archive (Game Boy Color): Strategy: Level Eight
By Y.K.TAN on Monday, July 16, 2001 - 03:04 am:

STAGE 8

At the start of the stage,move right once,and jump rightwards,and stand on the wooden box,and move right another time. IF YOU HAVE TIME,AND IF YOU ARE SKILLFUL,YOU MAY FIND A DUCK DOLL AROUND HERE,but next time,I'll create another guide to tell you which items are hidden where,so if you can't find it now,so,don't worry. So,let's continue. Go up the ledge,and destroy the box on the right/above you.as quick as lighning,re-create another box next to you,and climb up/right until you can see the golden key. Take the golden key,and jump off the box,right/downwards,heading towards the door,and if you land into the door,with perfect timing,you have WON STAGE 8. WARNING:IF YOU JUMP DOWN AT THE WRONG TIMING,AND TOUCH THE "RED MONSTERS" YOU WILL GET KILL,SO BE ALERT.
